title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate multi-step SDLC with Kiro (DVT321)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro 加速多步骤软件开发生命周期 (DVT321)
abstract: While existing AI assistants focus on code generation with close human guidance, Kiro CLI transforms how developers build software. By using natural language understanding, Kiro can intelligently perform multi-step tasks that go beyond code generation with minimal human intervention by automatically reading project files to build context, generating code diffs, and running shell commands. Join this session to discover how the new agentic coding experience helps developers go from planning to getting new features in front of customers even faster.
abstract_cn: 虽然现有的AI助手专注于在密切的人工指导下生成代码，但Kiro CLI改变了开发人员构建软件的方式。通过使用自然语言理解，Kiro能够智能地执行多步骤任务，这些任务超越了代码生成，只需最少的人工干预，它可以自动读取项目文件以构建上下文、生成代码差异并运行shell命令。加入本次会议，了解新的智能体编码体验如何帮助开发人员更快地从规划到让客户使用新功能。

presenter.name: Derek Chiles
presenter.title: Head of SA, Next Gen Developer Experience
